name: Strengthening Psychic and Spiritual Defense
description: Developing mental and energetic resilience to prevent reconditioning and external manipulation.

cards.title: Recognizing and Deflecting Psychic Attacks
cards.description: Understanding how ritualistic groups use remote influence, energetic attacks, and mental coercion.
bulletpoints: Detecting the subtle signs of energetic and psychic interference.
Applying shielding techniques to block external manipulation.
Understanding astral influence and how to counteract unwanted connections.

cards.title: Fortifying the Mind Against Reprogramming
cards.description: Strategies for creating a mental firewall against attempts to reinstall trauma-based control.
bulletpoints: Applying mental discipline techniques to reject intrusive thoughts.
Using breathwork and focus training to strengthen cognitive clarity.

cards.title: Energetic Detox and Soul Reclamation
cards.description: Using spiritual and energetic healing techniques to sever connections to past abuse and reclaim full sovereignty.
bulletpoints: Using sound frequencies and vibration therapy for energy clearing.
Reclaiming spiritual identity through guided visualization and meditation.
Performing self-directed rituals to sever past energetic attachments.
